t: The Petro Post » First Brands Group Acquires PetroClear and other Champion Laboratories Inc. Brands - The Petro Post
s: December 17, 2020 - PetroClear along with two other Champion Laboratories Inc. brands — Luber-finer and Champ Filters — have been acquired by First Brands Group, LLC (formerly TRICO Group). First Brands Group is a global automotive parts manufacturer that serves the worldwide automotive aftermarket industry with best-in-class technology and engineering capabilities.
